Class CloudDriverSupport

java.lang.Object
  org.cloudifysource.esc.driver.provisioning.CloudDriverSupport
All Implemented Interfaces:

Direct Known Subclasses:
MicrosoftAzureCloudDriver, PrivateEC2CloudifyDriver
Deprecated. 

@Deprecated
public abstract class CloudDriverSupport
extends Object
implements ProvisioningDriver

An abstract class with some commonly used code for custom cloud drivers.

Since:
2.1
Author:
barakme

addListener

public void addListener(ProvisioningDriverListener listener)
Deprecated. 
Description copied from interface: ProvisioningDriver
Adds a new listener. It is the responsibility of the cloud driver developer to publish a list of supported events.

Specified by:
addListener in interface ProvisioningDriver
Parameters:
listener - A class that implements ProvisioningDriverListner.

setAdmin

public void setAdmin(org.openspaces.admin.Admin admin)
Deprecated. 
Description copied from interface: ProvisioningDriver
Passes an Admin API object that can be used to query the current cluster state. The Admin API is typically only required for advanced use cases, like BYON. Note that this method is only called when the cloud driver is running in the ESM. The cloud driver instance used to create management machines will not get an Admin instance (in all likelihood, an Admin instance running in the client is not useful, as it will run on the wrong side of the firewall.) IMPORTANT: do not perform any blocking operations on this Admin instance as it is running in single threaded mode. Trying to use waitFor() methods on this instance will wither block forever or fail with a timeout.

Specified by:
setAdmin in interface ProvisioningDriver
Parameters:
admin - an instance of the Admin API, running in single threaded mode.

getMultiThreadedAdmin

protected org.openspaces.admin.Admin getMultiThreadedAdmin()
Deprecated. 
Returns a multithreaded admin instance, which can be used for blocking operations without blocking the shared Admin instance provided by the ESM. The method is synchronized to prevent several threads initializing the multi threaded admin. TODO: allow loading multi threaded admin into ESM context.

Returns:
the multi threaded admin instance.

setConfig

public void setConfig(Cloud cloud,
                      String templateName,
                      boolean management,
                      String serviceName)
Deprecated. 
Description copied from interface: ProvisioningDriver
Called once on startup of the cloud driver, passing the cloud configuration to it.

Specified by:
setConfig in interface ProvisioningDriver
Parameters:
cloud - The cloud configuration for this driver
templateName - The template required for this cloud driver.
management - true if this driver will launch management machines, false otherwise.
serviceName - The name of the service that is planned to be installed on this machine. Could be null if this is a management machine hosting more than one service

isStopRequestRecent

protected boolean isStopRequestRecent(String ip)
Deprecated. 
Checks if a stop request for this machine was already requested recently.

Parameters:
ip - the IP address of the machine.
Returns:
true if there was a recent request, false otherwise.
